seo.title: crypterium card
seo.description: Getting a card in just minutes? Yes! Apply for a virtual Crypterium Card and experience the fastest card issuance ever. Top it up straight from your Wallet, connect to Apple Pay and get ready to pay anywhere, anytime.

main.title: crypterium card
main.description: Getting a card in just minutes? Yes! Apply for a virtual Crypterium Card and experience the fastest card issuance ever. Top it up straight from your Wallet, connect to Apple Pay and get ready to pay anywhere, anytime.

list.title: Get a free virtual card in just minutes, not days
Top up with BTC, LTC, ETH & many other assets
Withdraw cash from ATMs in 200+ countries
Shop online & offline in over 42 million retailers
worry-free spending
list.description: Swipe, tap, or chip — pay with Crypterium Card in over 42 million physical and online retailers worldwide. Spend up to €5 000/mo

list.title: instant withdrawals
list.description: Turning your digital assets into cash just got easier and faster than ever before. Withdraw up to €2 500/mo from Visa-compatible ATMs

list.title: free card & tiny fees
list.description: Crypterium Card is free, with express delivery starting at €14.99. Could it be any better? Yes, load it with €299 every month and pay ZERO monthly maintenance (€2.99/mo)

banner.description_1: Your virtual Crypterium Card is all about saving you time. Submit your application and get your details in under 20 minutes. Less waiting, more fun!
banner.title_2: get it instantly and for free
banner.description_2: Just like the plastic Crypterium Card, the issuance is on us. If you have both a plastic and a virtual card, you still pay a single fee of €2,99/mo.

safe.title: stay digital, stay safe
safe.description_1: 3D Secure is an additional security layer for all your online transactions. A simple, yet effective way to protect yourself against "oops"
safe.description_2: With an SMS code and a secret phrase verification, your funds are always safe. Want more? Lock your card straight from your Wallet

diego.title: meet diego
diego.description: A few weeks after launching the Crypterium Card service, we asked some of our customers to share their experience with this payment solution for digital assets. Today, we’re kicking off a short series of community stories with Diego — a 27-y.o. developer from Barcelona

steps.title: easy steps to get your card

list.content: Fill in your details & pay for the delivery
Verify your identity & get approved in minutes
